channel.title: 马陈蕾的网页作业
channel.description: Recent content on 马陈蕾的网页作业

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there # My name is Radek and I’m the author of this theme. I made it to help you present your ideas easier. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing!

item.title: HELLO FRIEND
item.description: 这是一张我很喜欢的图片，用GIMP添加了部分水印并进行了调色。可以点点下面的更多内容看一下嘛。拜托了！

item.title: Showcase
item.description: 一些废话 # 我也不知道我修改的哪一行代码出现了问题，总之这个网页现在现实的发文日期一团糟。但是我认为我将这些跳转条目辨别出来并且修改为中文的能力还算ok，老师可以多给一丢丢分数吗！！！以及这一段虽然我没有看懂上面的介绍但是我觉得很牛所以保留下来了，自己另起了一小部分，原网页中我这一段是不存在的。 Header 2 # Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam nec interdum metus. Aenean rutrum ligula sodales ex auctor, sed tempus dui mollis. Curabitur ipsum dui, aliquet nec commodo at, tristique eget ante. Donec quis dolor nec nunc mollis interdum vel in purus. Sed vitae leo scelerisque, sollicitudin elit sed, congue ante. In augue nisl, vestibulum commodo est a, tristique porttitor est. Proin laoreet iaculis ornare.
